explains: n. 存款人，存放者；寄托者

sentences.en: I must confess an interest: I am a depositor at RBS.
sentences.cn: 我必须承认有既得利益：我在苏格兰皇家银行有存款。

sentences.en: The depositor positively positioned the preposition in that position on purpose.
sentences.cn: 储户有意确信地介词放置在那个位置。

sentences.en: The deposit amount is set by the depositor and the accrued interests are paid by installment.
sentences.cn: 存款金额由储户自定，分期支取本息。
